Phrase: After successfully fighting off the monsters, Yakutsk and I decided to assess the situation.
While resting in the camp she had set up for us, my memories came back to us as we talked together - and we were able to recall the situation.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Wa-Wait a minute! Do ya think any of these make sense?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Yes, I do. Who do you think I am?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: I am Fussen, the everlasting ruler possessing the 'Ancient Great Blood', a descendant of a royal Eisengrad bloodline, which has no equal in the world.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Sure, your ancestors may have been rulers a long time ago, but ya have no real power now! You are just another Eisengradian soldier, the same as me!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: And if you're a soldier, you should obey military rules!

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Hmmm. You're so lovely to look at, sadly you're so boring to talk to.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Whaaat? Who are you to say soldiers are boring, we are one!
...What's the fuss, Yakutsk? I can't concentrate on driving, can you keep it as quiet as possible?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Sir Conductor is right. What's the matter, Miss Yakutsk? It's not like you.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Oui, oui, No fighting, s'il vous plaît♪

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: We've been stuck in the car for so long, you're probably under a lot of stress... Do you want to smell some relaxing perfume?

Name: Putra
Phrase: HAH~! ATAH~! LET'S GOOOOO~!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, what are you doing, Miss Putra? Don't open the train window randomly, it's a blizzard out there, okay?

Name: Putra
Phrase: She said we're stressed out, so I thought this would cool down everyone's tension a little...!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Wow, it's really snowing outside! It never snows in Flamarine, this is so fresh, and it cools down bickering heads, killing two birds with one stone♪
Yakutsk... As Queensway just said earlier, this really isn't like you. Why were you fighting?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooooh. Maybe she's happy to be back home for the first time in a long time, Yoshino was also happy to return to Nishiki the other day.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: ...Even though there were a few sad things...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Yoshino... I'm sorry, I caused such a commotion after what happened.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: No, Yoshino is fine. Can get over the sad things together with my friends.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's why. Please... get along with each other and don't fight.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hm. I understand. But just so you know, I'm didn't start the fight.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's because Fussen suddenly started to complain, said 'I'm going to order Conductor to change our destination' or something.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's not right to 'order' Conductor, our superior officer, to change the destination, so that's why I'm pissed off.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Hmph. Call me 'Lady Fussen', you're disrespectful.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's why I said you're such a pompous ass...!
Chill chill... Fussen is genuinely a venerable Eisengrad royalty and aristocrat. You'll have to forgive her selfishness.
The Eisengradian government has also sent us orders to treat her with the utmost respect.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: See, there you go, that's an endorsement from the government, which is higher than the military. What do you still have to say about that, my klein obedient Eisengradian soldier?♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Gh, grrr! That's impossible, how could both the government and Conductor coddle ya like that...!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Now now... You really need to calm down, Yakutsk, you'll get wrinkles fast if you get too angry♪

Name: Putra
Phrase: Hey, hey! By the way, who is this uh, Fussen? Is she a queen? Usually it's just us, but we have a guest this time!
Ah... I haven't introduced you to her yet, as this time it was an urgent mission, so we had to leave in a hurry.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hmm. This operation - 'Triumphal Return', will take place in Eisengrad's capital, in collaboration with the local government and military, so...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: We asked Miss Fussen, who has contacts within her home country of Eisengrad, to accompany us, correct, Conductor?
Yes, Fussen is also a member of the SSS, so please be nice to her... Thanks for the explanation, Paddington.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawaawa...♪ No, no, it's my duty to save you the trouble, Conductor!

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Hmph, I'm enough of a liaison with the military. Besides, Fussen... Lady Fussen is certainly respected by the government, but she is also disliked because she is so arrogant.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: If this kind of problem gets in our way, even a successful mission will fail.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Hmph. That's a terrible thing to say, hating me this much... I don't mind. Taming a wild horse like you is a side hobby of mine♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: (Ugh... What the? I just got chills right now!)

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Anyway. The capital of Eisengrad, where the Triumphal Return ceremony is to be held, is located quite far from our base, the academy.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Therefore, it will be noon tomorrow at the earliest before we reach our destination. Eisengrad has a very high incidence of Phantom Mist, so originally the plan was to let you peasants stay overnight in my territory tonight to be on the safe side, right?
Yes, that's right. I would not want to move the train in the middle of the night in a place I don't know very well and where visibility is poor.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: I understand that. But dare I say... I don't mind if I accompany you, but I can't let you peasants stay within my territory.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: You will pass through my lands and ride all night to our destination, the Eisengrad capital.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: That's what I've come to tell you. This is an order, and I will not allow you to disobey it.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: That's why! I don't like it when you say that all of a sudden, we have our own schedule!
Now, now... Fussen isn't saying this just because she wants to mess with us, I'm sure? Is there any reason why you would want us to do that?

Name: Fussen
Phrase: I have my reasons, but I don't want to say it. It's fine, you will obey my orders. It's the duty of you fools to follow the ruler's wishes, isn't it?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Mgh, MGAAAAAAAHHH~! I CAN'T TAKE IT ANYMORE, WHO THE HELL DO YA THINK YOU ARE!?

Name: Putra
Phrase: Aiyah, the always calm Yakutsk is really pissed off...!?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Calm down, Yakutsk, hii hii fuu~ breathe, hii hii fuu~

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Um, everyone. I have a suggestion. There's no point in arguing at this point, and if I remember the route map correctly--

Name: Paddington
Phrase: If we choose the shortest route and proceed, perhaps we can reach our destination today. That way, we won't have to spend the night in Miss Fussen's territory.

Name: Fussen
Phrase: Oh? Good, good, I've been waiting for such a proposal. It's a clever way to solve the situation while fulfilling everyone's wishes, you're a brilliant St. Iris Divine Child...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hah... I'm humbled. But the Eisengrad region is heavily regulated by the military and we don't have much access to route maps.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I collect route maps as a hobby. So if we combine that with Paddington's knowledge and the rest of you from Eisengrad--
We might be able to work out the shortest route. Let's adopt that idea. Paddington will take the lead in calculating the shortest route.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Affirmative, Conductor...♪ Heheheh ♪ I hope I can be useful in this way, since I can't help you in battle!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Oooooh~ Paddington's worruler hard♪ Yoshino will help too, love maruler maps and stuff!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Then I'll be cheering for you! Fla, Fla, Flamarine♪! Ah, by the way, this is the national anthem of Flamarine! It's true, it's true!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Ahaha♪ I'll brew some nice herbal tea for you all!

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Hmmhmm. That's good. The awkward atmosphere is back to normal--

Name: Queensway
Phrase: ...Miss Yakutsk. You may not be happy. However, it's no use fighting with each other. Sometimes you need to swallow your bitterness.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: ...I know. I'm not complaining, Eisengrad soldiers shut up and follow orders.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Hmhmm. You've got a nice puffy face for saying that. Makes me want to pinch your cheeks, pinch pinch♪

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Unyah? Stop it, gosh! Ya changed so much, Queensway, you've succumbed into the SSS's peculiar light-heartedness!
And so on.... Naturally, everyone returned to a harmonious atmosphere, and they got along well with the route map and calculated the shortest route.
The train ran at full speed along the shortest route we have derived...
Yes, I remember. The tracks were covered with snow - because that was a route that no one usually stopped at.
No one noticed that the line was broken. Brakes did not work on the snow-covered ground and the train derailed and lost control...
It slid down into a huge crevice that appeared in front of our eyes.
